title: Recalling Ravi
description: In this episode of The Babylon Bee podcast, editor-in-chief Kyle Mann and creative director Ethan Nicolle talk about the biggest stories of the week like teenage expert Greta Thunberg teaching everything now, Elon Musk being the real-life Tony Stark, and Biden hiring a translator to render his speech into plain English. Ravi Zacharias went on to glory so our topic of the week is recalling Ravi's impact as an apologist and ambassador of the Gospel. This episode gets emotional.

title: What’s China’s Beef With Christianity?
description: Ethan and Kyle discuss with our guest, Tim Milosch why China doesn't have - let's say - the best relationship with Christianity.
